prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter with icy features.
Imagine an ice-type creature with a mystical aura and crystalline structures.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elegance with a chilling presence, perfect for snowy landscapes.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that uses snow and ice as part of its attack strategy.
Make a Pokemon that has a haunting beauty, with a body resembling a snow-covered figure.
Give me a unique ice-type Pokemon that can blend into its frosty environment seamlessly.
Design a Pokemon with a magical appearance that thrives in cold habitats and snowy regions.
